TopicTitle: Ships suddenly stop functioning, fly apart, Mun clipping. 0.25

Articles.Content:
Been a while since I posted, normally.. I don't need to these days.. but this one actually has me stumped. oh and 32bit not 64.

I'm running 0.25 with Deadly Re-Entry, Diazo's Landing Height, KW Rocketry, RCS Build Aid, Real Chute, Stage Recovery and Station Science. Module Manger is updated to 2.5.1 all mods are the latest.

At times when I switch ships to manned ones, they just.. stop functioning, the kerbal is missing from the lower right hand side, the fuel and stage info appears like it's shunted beyond the left hand side of the screen and generally the craft can't be used at all.. except for looking at how much fuel etc etc is in.

this has happened more than once tonight while streaming..

I'm having the same issue. Mods we have in common are: Deadly Re-entry, Stage Recovery, real chute, and module manager. I've just been going through the mods one by one to see which one creates the issue, about half way through, I will mess with it more tonight.

I believe I have the same problem. After vessel is launched into orbit, if I switch back (both from space center and by quickload) I see that crew is gone, parts are glitched/partially invisible, also Kerbin textures are a total mess and what remains of vessel is not controlable.

My common mods with both of you are also Deadly Re-entry, Stage Recovery, real chute, and module manager. I'll try to disable all mods just in case and try again, maybe damage is deeper than I think.

P.S. I'd bet on RealChute first, it had a messy bug before last hotfix that caused all contracts to disappear, so maybe there are more. But that's just a wild guess,

Update: did a test like this: disabled all mods and removed their remains like configs just in case; made new career, launched simple stock craft into orbit, switched back to SC and back to craft - worked fine. Exited game, enabled module manager and stage recovery, loaded game, switched to craft - fine. Exited, enabled RealChute, switched to craft - seemed to be fine. Switch to older save with almost stock craft (excepte RC was enabled and its chutes were used during craft's launch) - bug occured. Alt+F4, loaded most recent save that worked fine before - bug occured. Alt+F4, disabled RealChute, loaded that most recent save again - game works fine.

Seems like one of my favorite modes is causing trouble
